venue.name: Microsoft New England Research & Development Center (NERD)

item.description:
Our May BizSpark Meetup will be held on Thursday, May 6th at Microsoft Research Center located at One Memorial Drive in Cambridge. The security officer will direct attendees to the correct floor. There is parking available in the building. Parking is free on the street in front of the building at 6 PM.

At 7:00 PM PHP Meetup Organizer Michael Bourque will reprise his presentation "How To Design a Website Without A Single Line of Code". Michael will demo Balsamiq, MockupsToGo.net (a library of interfaces to be used with Balsamiq), SnagIt, and Napkee (an application that generates HTML/CSS/JS and Adobe Flex3 from a Balsamiq file).

I attended the March Boston PHP Meetup and I can personally tell you that what can be accomplished with the medley of these tools is amazing. I definitely wished I had used them when originally designing SocialGrow.com in my mind last fall.

I honestly believe this may be the most important BizSpark Meetup of the year for people looking to launch a startup.

After the presentation | demonstration, we will go around the room introducing ourselves and asking the group for advice | opinions on any startup-related issues members are facing.

Microsoft will provide pizza. What a generous organization!

Please RSVP and bring guests.

-Marsh Sutherland
item.name: How To Design A Site Without Code: Demo of Balsamiq, SnagIt, MockupsToGo, Napkee
